website_summaries.verdict: The OluKai Makia Ulana Kai ticks all of the boxes in terms of style and comfort. It features a knitted top that provides a sock-like fit. It has no-tie laces that deliver a snug fit and allow users to slip in and out of it without any hassle. The collapsible back also transforms the look from a trainer to a slider in one quick move.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers rave about how comfy the OluKai Makia Ulana Kai is for long walks or extended periods of standing
This pair of slip-on walking shoes fits like a sock, which many folks appreciate
This footgear is easy to put on and take off, commented a lot of wearers
Multiple individuals find the arch support adequate for what they need
More than a few consumers with bunions state that the upper material accommodates their foot issue
The athletic style of this trainer appeals to a lot of folks
cons: The garterized collar of the Makia Ulana Kai caused chafing at the back, says several users
Some people have noticed that their heel keeps slipping out while walking, which irked them
A few owners wished that they could adjust the laces to tighten the fit

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, true wide fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an easy slip on shoe to replace some sandals. Tried these and very happy. I run size 12, 3-4E and low arches. These have good support with a a snug but not too tight feel. The stretch material gives a supported feel with almost the sandal like freedom of movement. I bought a size up (13) because of the my width and fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wide Feet!
customer_reviews.text: I am a female with very wide feet. Even men's wide shoes usually don't fit right. These are perfect! Good width and good shape. The insoles were a bit weird, but I use orthotic insoles anyway, so the ones that came with the shoes were not a factor. Best purchase I've made in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I own several pair. This last order proves to me the sizes are inconsistent. Best to go to a store or you risk disappointing experience. Not made in America...what do you expect!
customer_reviews.author: SF-OGG

customer_reviews.title: Kool shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look kool. folding that back heel part down like in the pictures you show it feels very uncomfortable. Can’t really use them as skip ons And I think their about 1/2” bigger then normal ..
customer_reviews.author: FRANCO

customer_reviews.title: Buy every pair Olukai has.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased many pairs of Olukai, loved each one. No tying of my shoes, and when they get dirty I can throw them in the wash machine. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Burnvoth

customer_reviews.title: Versatile shoe that runs large
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very versatile with a nice casual style you can wear for many events or occasions. However, they do run large and for me I need a full size smaller than what I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: William pool

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes walking is super comfortable, unfortunately they were sent out to me without their insoles, I had to provide my own. That’s the only reason I’m giving it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair! That should say it all...they are the most comfortable shoe I’ve had in years!
customer_reviews.author: S. Weisberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and still love them. I tried some other styles but these prevailed. I also have some old flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Weber

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable shoes with good arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are super comfortable with good arch support. I can wear them all day and not have my feet pull all the muscles up my legs like shoes without support.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cozy and casual that’s look good and feel good to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My second pair...my favorite shoes....they wear great and fit even better. I’ve had the first pair a year and they still look good
customer_reviews.author: Lou L

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of summer shoes not so good for winters wet weather unless you like wet socks or feet
customer_reviews.author: Brad Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but narrowerer than other shoes that I have of this brand. Look great though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well built shoe. This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are different, took me a couple of days to learn how to put them on using tab on rear. Don't like the feel of having the back folded down.
customer_reviews.author: E. Penn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: The back of my heal hurts from over excursion and these are very comfortable with a flexible back.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: I've previously had foot surgery for plantar fasciitis and am always looking for a good shoe. These are so comfortable! I love them and their look!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Best Fitting Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome, I have had knee pain for the past 2 weeks within a few hours of wearing these shoes my knee doesn't hurt. I'll be a lifelong olukai shoe buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: OLUKAI Men's Makia Ulana Kai Sneakers Black
product_meta.description: Composed of hydrophobic yarns and water-resistant accents, the Makia Ulana Kai places a premium on cushioning, support, and rebound. Whether it’s an evening stroll along the coast or an afternoon spent fishing along the shore of your favorite creek, the Makia Ulana Kai won’t disappoint.
feature_bullets: FEATURES: Our patented Drop-In Heel design offers both a shoe or slide functionality, embroidered and embossed upper logos, medial drain ports and a midsole leather logo insert.
UPPER: Custom designed, unlined engineered knit upper composed of hydrophobic yarns with functional water-resistant PU coated overlays/accents. Elastic laces for easy on/off and a customized fit.
FOOTBED: A single density EVA footbed created with a compound to maximize cushioning, support and rebound with a textile cover. Removable and washable.
OUTSOLE: Lightweight molded EVA midsole with a non-marking 'Wet Grip Rubber' outsole, podded and siped for added traction on wet surfaces.
